name: works_list
description: Returns a list of work items matching the request.

arguments.argument_description: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts
Filters for work created by any of these users
Filters for issues with any of the provided priorities. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3
Filters for issues with any of the provided Rev organizations
The maximum number of works to return. The default is '50'
Filters for work owned by any of these users
Filters for records in the provided stage(s) by name
Filters for tickets that need a response
Filters for tickets associated with any of the provided Rev organizations
Filters for tickets with any of the provided severities. Allowed values: blocker, high, low, medium
Filters for tickets with any of the provided source channels
Filters for work of the provided types. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task
Filters for the date of creation of the work item. Allowed format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
Filters for work items last modified since a specified date. Allowed format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
Filter for the timestamp for when the work is expected to be complete. Allowed format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

name: summarize_objects
description: Summarizes a list of objects. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail.

arguments.argument_description: List of objects to summarize

name: prioritize_objects
description: Returns a list of objects sorted by priority. The logic of what constitutes priority for a given object is an internal implementation detail.

arguments.argument_description: A list of objects to be prioritized

name: add_work_items_to_sprint
description: Adds the given work items to the sprint

arguments.argument_description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.
The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

name: get_sprint_id
description: Returns the ID of the current sprint

name: get_similar_work_items
description: Returns a list of work items that are similar to the given work item

arguments.argument_description: The ID of the work item for which you want to find similar items

name: search_object_by_name
description: Given a search string, returns the id of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the confidence is highest.

arguments.argument_description: The search string, could be for example customer's name, part name, username.

name: create_actionable_tasks_from_text
description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.

arguments.argument_description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

name: who_am_i
description: Returns the ID of the current user

name: is_empty
description: Checks if a given list is empty and returns one of two lists based on the result.

arguments.argument_description: The list to be checked for emptiness.
Two lists of objects. Returns the first one if the list_to_check is empty, otherwise returns the second one.

name: count
description: Returns the number of work items in the output of an API call.

arguments.argument_description: A list of objects to be counted.

name: works-create
description: Creates work items based on the provided parameters.

arguments.argument_description: The part that the work applies to. Specifying a part is required when creating tickets and issues. Note: REQUIRED
The users that reported the work
The Priority of the work based upon impact and criticality. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3
The IDs of the parts associated with work item
The users that own the work. Note: REQUIRED
Sets an objects initial stage
The sprint that the issue belongs to
Type of the work item. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task. Note: REQUIRED
Timestamp for when the work is expected to be complete. Allowed format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
Title of the work object; Note: REQUIRED. Allowed values: issue, ticket
The work's ID
id of the work item to be updated. REQUIRED.
Updates the part(s) that the work item applies to.
Sets the users that reported the work to the provided user IDs
Sets the owner IDs to the provided user IDs. This must not be empty
The updated name of the stage, otherwise unchanged if not set
Updates the type of the work item. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task
Updates the timestamp for when the work is expected to complete
Updated title of the work object, or unchanged if not provided
Updates the priority of the work item. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3

name: rev-orgs-create
description: Creates a Rev organization based on provided parameters.

arguments.argument_description: Description of the Rev organization
Name of the Rev organization
The environment of the Org. Defaults to 'production' if not specified.
Id of the Rev organization to be deleted

name: rev-orgs-update
description: Creates a Rev organization based on provided parameters.

arguments.argument_description: Description of the Rev organization
Name of the Rev organization
The environment of the Org. Defaults to 'production' if not specified.
The ID of Rev organization to update.

name: get_works_id
description: Get's the work id of the input objects

arguments.argument_description: List of objects to get ID of
